motor kawasaki klx 150 · motor kawasaki klx 150 Power-trains. The motor kawasaki klx 150 is powered by a Air Cooled 144 cc 1 Cylinder motor kawasaki klx 150 that gives 11.8hp of power at 8000 rpm and 11.3 Nm Torque at 6500 rpm. It comes with the option of a 5-Speed transmission gearbox. The motor kawasaki klx 150 has a seat height of 255 mm. The Front Tyre size is 70/100 R19 & Rear Tyre size is 90/100 R16.
